notes.content:
Jan 9, 2026 Meeting Summary

Upmarket Opportunity Discussed:
Green Check Verified - Tom secured verbal thumbs up from co-founder/CSO for MCP sales meeting. Current Pro 50k customer; AI/MCP is huge priority for their dev team enablement. Found 8 accounts associated (only 1 paid) - consolidation opportunity.

Action Items:
Brandon: Get MCP enablement materials from Chris Ondera (Due: Jan 13)
Brandon: Prep MCP pitch deck using Gamma (Due: Jan 15)
Tom/Aris: Complete Zapier training to maintain Platinum status (Due: Jan 17)
Team: Schedule Green Check sales meeting (Due: Jan 20)

Jan 9, 2026 Meeting Summary

Upmarket Opportunity Strategy:
Focus on proving co-sell motion with ONE account before scaling. Target: Austin-based accounts to enable in-person Workflow Lab event. MDF budget available: $1,000-$2,500 range.

Co-Marketing Plans:
Austin Workflow Lab event targeting Rev Ops professionals. AI Train the Trainer bootcamp pilot with Pyxis team.

Action Items:
Parker Short: Review client list for Austin-based accounts (Due: Jan 16)
Parker Short: Submit MDF form for Austin Workflow Lab event (Due: Jan 16)
Brandon: Absorb AI Train the Trainer material (Due: Jan 17)

Status: Pending Activation

No active upmarket opportunity yet. Reviewing potential accounts with Michael Shen. Singapore time zone presents scheduling challenges.

Action Items:
Michael Shen: Review submitted account list and prioritize (Due: Jan 17)
Brandon: Schedule sync with Michael to align on activation (Due: Jan 20)

Jan 9, 2026 Partnership Kickoff Meeting

Partnership exploration with Orium (250-person professional services firm). Focus areas: AI orchestration, agent solutions, headless commerce. Enterprise clients include: Apple, Steelcase, Stripe.

Key Discussion Points:
Showcased Stripe automated payment audit solution. Offer Agentix Strategy Canvas - 2-day workshop for client AI readiness. Bruce Lee (new AE, 10yr iPaaS experience) will be primary contact.

Action Items:
Ryan Kaschak: Bring specific customer examples to follow-up meeting
Bruce Lee (Orium): Review Crossbeam shared customers (Due: Jan 20)
Michael Shen: Schedule follow-up strategy meeting (Due: Jan 17)

Status: Partner Services Fund Opportunity

PSF engagement with Connex Digital for enterprise implementation support. Active referral partner with $9,237 revenue and 460 referrals in 2025.

Action Items:
Brandon: Define PSF engagement scope and budget (Due: Jan 20)
Brandon: Align with Andres on partner deliverables (Due: Jan 17)
Team: Identify target enterprise customer for PSF pilot (Due: Jan 24)
